content: this knit sweater is inspired by timeless stripes - with a twist stitched in caron anniversary cakes you only need one color to create the eclectic striped pattern practice knit 2 together slip slip knit knit front back and more explore color to make the pattern suit your taste and style a wonderful ease of fit makes this garment a natural for gifting materials caron® anniversary cakes™ 35 5 oz/1000 g 1061 yds/970 m sizes xs/s m l hocus crocus 47038 1 1 1 ball sizes xl 2/3xl 4/5xl hocus crocus 47038 1 2 2 ball s sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
